item.title: [ Leetcode 1343 ] Number of Sub-arrays of Size K and Average Greater than or Equal to Threshold | Solution Approach & Explanation
item.description: Given an integer array nums, along with two integers k and threshold, find the number of subarrays of length k whose average is greater than or equal to threshold. LinküîóÔºöhttps://leetcode.com/problems/number-of-sub-arrays-of-size-k-and-average-greater-than-or-equal-to-threshold/ Problem Analysis The goal is to find all subarrays of length k that meet the given condition. This means we need to examine every subarray of length k. Brute Force A straightforward approach is to enumerate all possible subarrays of length k.
